actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require that the Congressional Budget Office prepare an analysis of the job loss or gain that would result from each reported bill.

summary.text: Job Impact Accountability Act of 1993 - Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the Congressional Budget Office to prepare a five-year analysis of the job loss or gain that would result from each reported bill or resolution.

titles.title: To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require that the Congressional Budget Office prepare an analysis of the job loss or gain that would result from each reported bill.
